sentence.Network_en: Crops can be grown on this land after desalination.
sentence.Network_cn: 这片土地经过脱盐就可以种植庄稼了。

sentence.Network_en: One source is by desalination - taking the salt out of salt water to make it drinkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 淡水的来源之一是使水淡化 -- 把含盐的水中的盐份去掉,使之能够饮用.

sentence.Network_en: Renewables will also support a desalination plant that will provide fresh water.
sentence.Network_cn: 可循环使用的能源也会提供给会生产干净水的脱盐加工工厂.

entry.def: Desalination is the process of removing salt from sea water so that it can be used for drinking, or for watering crops.

means.word_mean: 1. the removal of salt (especially from sea water)

auth_sentence.content: Desalination at a cheap cost would be most desirable.
